en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Muay Thai Event Live on Thailand's BBTV Channel 7!
en.content: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor Muay Thai boxing event at BBTV Channel 7's indoor stadium on Sunday 15th March 2009. The event was attended by more than 3,000 spectators and telecast live on BBTV Channel 7 to an audience of 20 million all over Thailand. FusionExcel's Founder CEO Paul Ting together with FusionExcel's Thailand Country Licensee Don Chan attended the event and presented Quantum Pendants to the boxers in the ring. The commentator for the event is award winning Muay Thai boxing personality Chaitat Salatan (K.Piak) who is also an FusionExcel Leader and Quantum Pendant Wearer! FusionExcel is certainly building a large following in Thailand!

meta.description: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor Muay Thai boxing event at BBTV Channel 7's indoor stadium on Sunday 15th March 2009.
meta.keyword: FusionExcel, Muay Thai Event Live on Thailand's BBTV Channel 7, 15th March 2009, Founder CEO Paul Ting, Chaitat Salatan (K.Piak), Don Chan.
meta.author: klhunter
